section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported:The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: He who finds (gets) a rak'ah of the afternoon (prayer) before the setting of the sun, he in fact gets (the full prayer), and he who gets a rak'ah of the morning (prayer) before the rising of the sun he in fact gets (the full prayer)
